member.name: T:AspNetTicketBridge.MachineKeyDataProtector
member.summary: IDataProtector implementation that uses a provided machine key purposes to protect / unprotect data via the MachineKey Utility Class.

member.name: M:AspNetTicketBridge.MachineKeyDataProtector.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Constructor - Be sure to set purposes here, or use the ForPurposes method.
member.param: MachineKey validation key
MachineKey decryption key
Decryption Algorithm - Default AES
Validation Algorithm - Default HMACSHA1

member.summary: Create a new immutable MachineKeyDataProtector with the specified purposes.

member.summary: This is a required implementation of IDataProtector, but not recommended for this use case

member.summary: Protect some data with the machine key provided.

member.summary: Unprotect some data with the machine key provided.

member.name: M:AspNetTicketBridge.MachineKeyTicketProtector.ProtectOAuthToken(AspNetTicketBridge.OwinAuthenticationTicket,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Serializes, encrypts and encodes an AuthenticationTicket created by OWIN's OAuth server implementation for the access token.
member.param: The v3 AuthenticationTicket
The machineKey decryptionKey found in your web.config
The machineKey validationKey found in your web.config
The machineKey decryptionAlgorithm found in your web.config (Auto == AES)
The machineKey validationAlgorithm found in your web.config

The machineKey decryptionKey found in your web.config
The machineKey validationKey found in your web.config
The machineKey decryptionAlgorithm found in your web.config (Auto == AES)

The machineKey decryptionKey found in your web.config
The machineKey validationKey found in your web.config
The machineKey decryptionAlgorithm found in your web.config (Auto == AES)
The machineKey validationAlgorithm found in your web.config

The machineKey decryptionAlgorithm found in your web.config (Auto == AES)
